div.p: […] … Phil(?)[… of about] 39 [years old], (he) freed among friends [and (he) ordered she stayed free] … in the next … of June … [… Drawn up in the Arsin]oite nome, in the metropolis, on the 13th day before the Calends [of April … under the consulship … in the … year of …] Felix Augustus, [on the 24th] of the month Pham[enoth …] [(2nd hand) …] my slave Sarapous, … […] in no way, as set out above [… (3rd hand) … I am witne]ss (4th hand) I, Aurelius Hermas, son of Is[…], am wi[tness (5th hand) I, Au]relis [… (6th hand) …] I am witness of man[u]miss[io …] Translation: A. Stornaiuolo, AnalPap 31 (2019) 49
